entry.title: Pretzel Manifesto
entry.content:
PRETZELS ARE FOR THE PEOPLE

IN A COLD, HARSH WORLD WE TAKE COMFORT IN THE WARMTH OF FRESH PRETZELS

LEADERS OF THE WORLD, LEND ME YOUR EARS AND IN THE MANIFESTO BELOW, I WILL DESCRIBE HOW THE WORLD MAY BE RESTORED TO PEACE AND HARMONY

todo: write manifesto

entry.title: The Perfect Pretzel
entry.summary:
What is perfection? What does it mean to live life to fullest? Why do bad things happen to good people?

These are questions to which no answers are known. All I know, dear readers, is that the closest I have come to experiencing perfection, the sublime, was when I ate â€¦
entry.content:
What is perfection? What does it mean to live life to fullest? Why do bad things happen to good people?

These are questions to which no answers are known. All I know, dear readers, is that the closest I have come to experiencing perfection, the sublime, was when I ate my first pretzel. On that day, my life changed forever.

entry.title: My First Article
entry.content: Hello World! I like pretzels and free static web hosting.
